author: Staff Reporter
text:
A Postal ATM has been inaugurated in Tiruvannamalai Head Post Office on Saturday.

Member of Parliament, Tiruvannamalai constituency and Information Technology standing committee member in Parliament, R. Vanaroja inaugurated the facility in the presence of Mervin Alexander, Post Master General, Chennai City Region of the postal department and Superintendent of Posts, Tiruvannamalai, L. Chandrasekaran.
title: Tiruvannamalai Post Office gets postal ATM
